ProjectStatistics.subtitle: Ku bibiyi cigaba da ake samu daga gare ku da sauran 'yan sa-kai game da wannan aiki.
ProjectStatistics.text: Kowane latsawa yana da muhimmanci! Shiga cikin tawagar {{projectName}} domin kammala wannan aikin don taimaka wa manazarta wajen fitar da muhimman sakamako. Latsa "Duba ƙarin bayanai" domin ganin ƙarin bayanai.
ProjectStatistics.title: Ƙididdigar Bayanan {{projectName}}
